laboratory_examinations.findings: Partial oxygen tension of 57; widespread pulmonary parenchymal infiltrates
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased and retreated infiltrates, with each relapse costing him strength

laboratory_examinations.findings: Documented widespread cystic disease and bilateral hilar adenopathy
Alteration between red and black and green visual field targets
No treatable problem, confirming suspicion of probable Alzheimer disease
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Dementia progressed to the point where he mistook the doctor for a niece
